text: Jean-Louis Xavier Trintignant (11 December 1930 – 17 June 2022) was a French actor, racecar driver, producer and director. He won an César Award for Best Actor as Georges in the 2012 French movie Amour. In July 2018, he announced his retirement from cinema.Jean-Louis Trintignant says good-bye to the cinema and begins to say goodbye to life Trintignant was born on 11 December 1930 in Piolenc, Vaucluse, France.Jean-Louis Trintignant biography (1930-) He was raised in Piolenc and in Paris. Trintignant was married to Stéphane Audran until they divorced. Then he was married to Nadine Marquand from 1960 until they divorced in 1976. He had three children; including Marie. In November 2017, Trintignant announced that he was diagnosed with prostate cancer.JEAN- LOUIS TRINTIGNANT.
